(full CV available on request)

### Directory, CTO
## TutorCruncher
November 2013 - Present (5 months)London, United Kingdom

Helping continue to add features to the leading agency management system as well as keeping the cloud platform fast and responsive as we grow quickly.

## Freelance Software Engineer
August 2013 - Present (8 months)Mayfair, London

### Mechanical Engineer (Tech & Field Program)
## Schlumberger
March 2012 - August 2013 (1 year 6 months)Stonehouse, UK

Working on the DMM (Drilling Mechanics Module) tool for Schlumberger D&M.

### Directional Driller (Tech & Field Program)
## Schlumberger
August 2011 - April 2012 (9 months)Greater Jakarta Area, Indonesia

Part of the first phase of the Tech & Field program. Worked on Land rigs, Jack-ups and in deep water running motors and RSS tools.

### MWD Engineer (Tech & Field Program)
## Schlumberger
September 2010 - July 2011 (11 months)Greater Jakarta Area, Indonesia

Part of the first phase of the Tech & Field program.

## University: Clare College, University Of Cambridge
2006 to 2010
### 4th Year: Merit, Master of Engineering

**Modules:**

Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) Aerodynamics

Flow Instability

Turbulence

Design Methods

Advanced Linear Vibrations

International Business Economics

Applications of Dynamics

**Final Year Project:**
CFD Analysis and Design of the 2011 Cambridge University Eco Racing Car

### 3rd Year: 2.1, BA

**Modules:**

Fluid Mechanics I

Fluid Mechanics II

Dynamics

Vibrations

Machine Design

Modeling Risk

Systems and Control

Partial Differential Equations and Variational Methods
